Pre-Game Insights: Netherlands and South Africa are 1-1 head-to-head in the T20I format going into their highly anticipated T20 World Cup 2024 clash.
The Netherlands scrapped past Nepal in a tough opening clash of the tournament, gaining those two valuable points on the standings.
South Africa were exceptional in all three departments of the game against Sri Lanka in their T20 World Cup 2024 opener.
Netherlands bowlers were on top of their game during their T20 World Cup opener against Nepal, keeping them to under 110 runs in their allotted overs.
South Africa's bowling attack put on a clinical performance against Sri Lanka, bundling them out for just 77 runs with Anrich Nortje picking up four wickets on his return to the national team.
